instruction: List the steps needed to use a graphing calculator
output: The steps needed to use a graphing calculator include: 1) Familiarize yourself with the calculator’s features and buttons; 2) Enter data into the calculator; 3) Set the preferences for how you want data to be displayed; 4) Select an appropriate graph type; 5) Adjust the graph’s properties, such as its scaling; 6) Analyze the graph; and 7) Print the graph if necessary.
